Reason_no_tutorial: This tool was relegated due to difficulty with installation as the package has been removed from CRAN. Manual installation instructions were difficult to follow.

Functionalities: MOI estimation, Allele frequency estimation

Reason_no_tutorial: This tool has largely been superseeded by MultiLociBiallelicModel, which also estimates prevalence but does not require MOI, can do more loci and estimates the MOI from the input data
Functionalities: Haplotype frequency estimation
Functionality_notes: MOI estimation and prevalence estimates are secondary (essentially untested), program does not work on Mac or Linux

Reason_no_tutorial: The code for this program was removed from CRAN in 2014, does not appear to be activiely maintained and is no longer available for download other than from archives. A program that does something similar is MultiLociBiallelicModel.

Functionalities: MOI estimation, haplotype frequency estimation

Reason_no_tutorial: Due to limited documentation on installation, we were unable to install and run the tool. The tool has not been updated in seven years
